attributes.action: other than Grandparents, let other family members such as aunties & uncles & older cousins older than the age of the son or daughter to have the right to adopt their nephew/niece/cousin
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Who thinks this is a good idea as Grandparents might be a bit old and as there is a more chance that they will die in the older ages than aunties and uncles and cousins are?

I think this is a good option because then at least they are going to be with family members.
